name: UDMlib
tagline: Unstructured data management library for parallel simulators.
body:
### Welcome to UDMlib
UDMlib is a file/data management library for parallel simulators using unstructured data.

### License
* BSD (2-clause) license

### Copyright
- Copyright (C) 2012-2015 Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo. All rights reserved.

- Copyright (c) 2015 Advanced Institute for Computational Science, RIKEN. All rights reserved.

### Software Requirement
* MPI library
* CGNS `http://cgns.sourceforge.net/`
* ZOLTAN `http://www.cs.sandia.gov/Zoltan/Zoltan.html`
* Text Parser library `http://avr-aics-riken.github.io/TextParser/`

### Contributors and Contact
* Kenji Ono  keno@riken.jp
* Yasuhiro Kawashima
* Jorji Nonaka  jorji@riken.jp
